Name: Meet the Parents
Title: Meet the Parents
Desc: A woman's father (Robert De Niro) thinks her boyfriend (Ben Stiller) is unworthy.
LongDescription: Everything that can possibly go wrong for groom-to-be Greg Focker (Ben Stiller) does. The problems begin with Greg's disastrous first meeting with his girlfriend's family -- most notably her intimidating father Jack Byrnes (Robert De Niro) and it's all downhill from there.
